attributes.description:
FINANCE AVAILABLE. TRADE INS WELCOME. FSH. DELIVERY NATIONWIDE. ADMIN, LICENSE AND TRANSPORT FEES EXCLUDED
Capacity (cm3) 999
Cylinders 3
Valves (per cylinder) 4
Power (kW) 55 @ 6200 revs
Torque (Nm) 95 @ 3000 revs
CO2 Emissions (g/km) 106
Fuel Type Petrol
Transmission
5-speed manual gearbox 
Performance
Acceleration in seconds (0-100 km/h) 13,5
Top speed (km/h) 173
Fuel consumption (litres/100km/h)
Urban cycle 5,4
Extra-urban cycle 3,8l/100
Combined cycle 4,6l/100km
Running Gear
Front ventilated disc brakes
Rear drum brakes
Front axle: MacPherson struts, coil springs
Anti-roll bar
Rear axle: Torsion beam, torsion bar, coil springs
Anti-roll bar
Wheelrims / Tyres
Steel wheels 14" with wheel covers, (165/70 R14)
Full-size steel spare wheel (incl. toolkit & jack)
Dimensions / Capacities
Fuel tank (l) 35
Luggage space (/) (rear seats folded up) 251
Luggage space (/) (rear seats folded down) 959
Length (mm) 3 600
Height (mm) 1 504
Width (mm) 1 641
Ground clearance (mm) 144
Wheelbase (mm) 2 407
Track - front (mm) 1 412
Track - rear (mm) 1 408
Turning circle (m) 9,8
Weights
Tare Mass 818
GVM 1 330
Audio & Communication
Radio "Composition": 3.1-inch monochrome display, radio/CD, SD card & AUX-in
Safety
Airbag for driver and front passenger
Side head/thorax airbags for driver and front passenger
Electronic stability control (ESP)
Anti-lock brake system (ABS)
Anti-Spin Regulator (ASR)
High-mounted third brake lamp
Power steering
Halogen headlights (low and high beam)
Indirect tyre pressure monitoring system
Security
Electronic immobiliser
ISOFIX anchors without cover (device for attaching 2 child seats on the rear seat bench)
Central locking system with radio remote control
Seats
Driver's seat with height adjustment
Rear seat bench, non-split back folding
Front headrests (integrated in seat)
2 height-adjustable rear headrests
Mirrors
Door mirrors adjustable from inside the car
Windows
Green heat-absorbing glazing
Rear window heater
Front electric windows
Wiper System
Windscreen wipers with intermittent wipe function
Rear window wiper with intermittent wipe
Interior Features
Air-conditioning system manual
Steering column with height adjustment
Sun visors on driver and front passenger sides
Instrument cluster with electronic speedometer, odometer and trip meter
Dashboard - grained
Exterior
5-door body style
Bumpers in body colour
Side mirror housings and door handles in black
15 000 km service intervals

attributes.description: At Kia Hatfield we pride ourselves on delivering quality used vehicles to our clients. All our vehicles undergo a 125 quality point check, Dekra roadworthy, Dekra Conditional report and a valet before being delivered . All vehicles are delivered with a full service history and are accident free. The one thing we pride ourselves in more than anything is EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SERVICE. When buying a vehicle from us, you join the Kia Family and family look after each other. We will tailor make a package that will not only suit your needs and your pocket too. We deal through all major financial institutions and always pride ourselves on giving you the best deal. CALL NOW and one of our experienced Sales Executives will gladly bring the vehicle out to you to test drive from the comfort of your own home or workplace. CALL NOW and you could be driving off in the car of yours dreams.  Nationwide delivery. (can be arranged at a cost) All Trade-in's welcome. Finance can be arranged, Contact us toda

attributes.description:
Welcome to the King of Cars Group

King of Cars has more than 15 years of experience in the motor industry and offers over 200 professionally evaluated vehicles. We offer advice & assistance to clients, from financial solutions to the smart way to buy / sell your vehicle. 

We also offer a ‘Breaking Borders’ approach. We can start the application process online or telephonically, complete the entire sale this way and even deliver the vehicle to your doorstep anywhere in South Africa. We’ll help you make the car of your dreams a reality.  

Contact or visit our showroom today!

Please Note: Administration, delivery and license and registration fees are not included.
